title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Morwell veterans]
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Veterans - Australia - Health aspects
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Personal narratives, Australian
abstract: Ten interviews with war veterans from Morwell in eastern Victoria.
description: Ten Victorian veterans from Morwell tell stories of their time of service, providing their unique perspectives on army life, wartime and coming home to Australia. Produced with the assistance of Morwell RSL and the students of Kurnai College, Morwell.
